game_description: 《You Calligrapher》is an authentic VR Calligraphy simulator. In 《You, Calligrapher》, you will be empowered to imitate the masterpieces of poets and scholars, draw and paint with traditional ink pen. Witness and experience the culture of Calligraphy! - Featuring - - Realistic ink brush physics - Mutiple color for painting and writing - Caligraphy and Chinese learning - Templates of masterpieces - Save & Share your words, paints, illustrations...etc
review_1: First, thank you developers of this simply basic app. Enjoyed and want more if possible. Able to have larger size of papers to choose from. More difficult size of paper and more brushes , more colors too if possible. Able to import templates , pictures, photo, and paintings into the VR environment for reference if possible. So that I have a reference template or pictures or painting in front of you or by holding the reference template with your other free hand. Please continue to add more functions, more options , more idea into this app if possible. Please add more painting functions and options . So that it will perform both writing and painting tools. Thank you
